dict.acceptation: 不见，消失；不复存在，灭绝；

sent.orig: When attachment, aversion and delusion disappear, they disappear in the same way.
sent.trans: 贪、嗔、痴是以同样的方式消失的。

sent.orig: The dictatorship will become unnecessary when classes disappear dictatorship of the proletariat they will not disappear.
sent.trans: 当阶级消亡之后，无产阶级专政就变的不必要了。

sent.orig: It appears as the occurrence of market economy, as market economy disappear and disappear.
sent.trans: 它随着市场经济的出现而出现，随着市场经济的消失而消失。

sent.orig: Having arisen from economic causes, will monogamy then disappear when these causes disappear?
sent.trans: 可是，既然一夫一妻制是由于经济的原因而产生的，那么当这种原因消失的时候，它是不是也要消失呢？

sent.orig: So over here, tell me what I want to hear. Better yet, make your girlfriend disappear.
sent.trans: 所以来吧，把我所要听到的告诉我。或者更好，让你的女朋友消失不见。
